text: Kuma daga cikin mutane akwai mai cewa, 'Mun yi imani da Allah" sa'an nan idan aka cuce shi wajen aikin Allah, sai ya sanya fitinar mutane kamar azabar Allah kuma lalle idan taimakon Ubangijinka ya zo, haƙiƙa, ya kan ce: "Lalle mu mun kasance tare da ku." shin, Allah bai zama Mafi sani ba ga abin da ke a cikin ƙirazan halittunSa
